definitions.definition: either of the two equal or nearly equal parts that together make up a whole:

examples: She invited a lot of people to the party but half of them didn't turn up.

definitions.definition: Half past a particular hour is 30 minutes later than that hour:
examples: I'll meet you at half past nine (= 09.30 or 21.30).
He answered the door half naked.

definitions.definition: to divide the cost of something with someone:
examples: Shall we go halves on a bottle of champagne?

definitions.definition: equal amounts of two different things:
examples: You can use just sugar, just honey, or half and half.

definitions.definition: 50 percent more of the existing number or amount
